sense.name: improving
sense.commentary: RENOVATION[+event] redevelopment - the act of improving by renewing and restoring
sense.examples: He needs a place to stay because his building is undergoing renovation. The renovation of the house took only two months.

sense.name: restored
sense.commentary: restoration, refurbishment - the state of being restored to its former good condition
sense.examples: The inn was a renovation of a Colonial house.
